Review Comment: Your internet at the tip of your fingers, LIKE IT SHOULD BE.
Works as described. App updates have improved speed tests.
PLEASE PROVIDE A WEB BROWSER INTERFACE.  The android app wouldnt allow me to change the ip address of the router, kept giving me some subnet mask error that made no sense.
It said couldn't connect to my network
Got given 3 eeros Spent,  a day trying to set this up, gave up and chucked the lot in the bin in frustration.
Simple to use and the product works as advertised.
Best wifi extender you could ever buy.
I don't know what the people do that it dosent work for. You read the screen and you do what it says. Mine works great and the installation could not have been easier. Greatest wi fi I have ever had.
Tedious installation and doesn't work well with Android devices
Latest update is wonderful..... Best purchase I have ever made. Eero just continues to get better and better. Keep up the great work.
How networking should be.
Idk yet but it looks good with all your thoughts
Super power throughout the home.
Best purchase ever
Great App!!
Eero has simplified my life,  so easy to manage everything with one app.
Very good app
The app is slick, setup is easy, and these things just work. Awesome.
I don't like the new look. I think it was more elegant before.
Great simple app for managing the network.  After last update you can run speed test anymore.
Some devices are not showed as connected since recent updates.
Great app, and you don't have to dig down too deep for more specific config options. Dashboard gives a great simple overview of network and devices.
Gets better and better. I love the new dashboard

Title: Amazing product!!
Review Comment: Amazing product!! This is by far the best wifi AP I have used. the product setup is great and the app is clean and easy to use.

Title: Sales
Review Comment: Sales it is good product

Title: Where has this technology been!
Review Comment: Where has this technology been! Amazing! I previously had a fairly powerful wireless router with three additional extenders throughout the house and had constant issues with poor connection and dead spots. All gone! A nice feature would be to automatically run the ISP speed test on some schedule and to also keep some amount of history of the results.

Title: Simply Works
Review Comment: Simply Works The app is smooth, simple and everything I need. It allows me to manage my network from whereber I am. Works perfectly with all of my devices and I never have to worry about it. The system itself solved my townhouse pain points.

Title: Gets better and better
Review Comment: Gets better and better Love the new feature to see what eero a device is connected to. Also love the auto updates on the firmware. Keep up the great work. A Mesh Network is the best answer for most larger or complex layouts

Title: Saved us from our Wifi
Review Comment: Saved us from our Wifi So easy, so fast. The updates keep coming, and I love that eero can be set-and-forget or really customizable. Thanks for the update that allows seeing which eero devices are connected to, and two related feature requests: the ability to manually switch which eero a device connects to, and the ability to see how much data & bandwidth a device has been using (good for capped wifi plans!). Keep up the great work eero, love it.

Title: Spectacular!
Review Comment: Spectacular! Really enjoying the coverage provided by the mesh technology.

Title: Decent
Review Comment: Decent Speeds aren't quite as good as I hoped, but it works well

Title: Almost There
Review Comment: Almost There Please Let Us Hide Our Networks (Add Turn Off SSID Broadcast Option) I only want my guest network available. I know hidden networks are not more secure.

Title: Best network investment
Review Comment: Best network investment The system is so convenient to use.

Title: Great work guys!
Review Comment: Great work guys! Love the constant improvements and the product

Title: Looks cool
Review Comment: Looks cool APP is very functional and easy. Good to see how much each device is consumed.  After using 3 months . I recently  WIRED  my ROKU and found eero connection is better than wired.

Title: Missing a lot of functionality
Review Comment: Missing a lot of functionality Can't block devices, can't check usage of each device, can't hide the network... Eero is great but the app could be improved.

Title: Very buggy
Review Comment: Very buggy Lots of bugs. 1. The speed test numbers have not updated for over a week. 2. Connection quality for some Eeros stuck in "refreshing data". 3. Does not accurately show devices on the network. 4. "Pull to refresh" hangs the app. I spent a lot of money on the Eero system and am very disappointed with the poor quality of this app.

Title: Great start
Review Comment: Great start Still can't see the amount of data each device is using.  I thought it was enabled in v2.0

Title: It straight up fixed my WiFi
Review Comment: It straight up fixed my WiFi I had multiple hotspots with different names, and I still had bad WiFi reception. They wife, kids, and guests complained about it as they moved around our house.  Then I got Eero.  One network name for my family and our devices and another with a separate password (that I can change whenever I want!) so we don't have to give out the main one.  Easy to set up!

Title: No info
Review Comment: No info Did not tell me had to buy a 300 dollar eero router to use it.
Lack of features and no Sonos support.

Title: De
Review Comment: De Demetrius

Title: Awesome!!
Review Comment: Awesome!! A truly great WiFi system that functions as advertised and becomes consistently better as time goes on. The eero team as a whole is great they certainly know what they are doing and show no signs of stopping or slowing down. Anyone that doesn't have at least one needs to join the bandwagon these are the future are incredible plus not to mention stylish.
Good coverage

Title: Love it
Review Comment: Love it I've have had WiFi in my home for many years and recently decided to upgrade... the eero system is by far the easiest system I have ever setup and had to manage.

Title: Love it
Review Comment: Love it Total house coverage.

Title: Greatness in its simplicity.
Review Comment: Greatness in its simplicity. Set it and forget it. Eero app works well. Looking forward to the new release with more functionality.

Title: Works better then dlink
Review Comment: Works better then dlink Replaced my dgl-5500 with this system. Works great with gig fiber from att. App works great.

Title: Just works
Review Comment: Just works WiFi, made simple. Eero-er free.  Unleash your home broadband.

Title: Great App Great Product
Review Comment: Great App Great Product Wireless and security have always required a bit of knowledge and skill to achieve.  Eero takes the difficulty out of getting this done.
Setting up the network was a breeze. The app makes giving guests access easy.
What is the best product that I purchased...                                        that said what it was gonna do and work !!!!

Title: This is an App Review Not Hardware
Review Comment: This is an App Review Not Hardware The app is very quick and stable, and is less limited in the functions it can control than the launch version. It is coming along quite nicely.

Title: Wi-Fi Works
Review Comment: Wi-Fi Works Anyone can install this. No more sticky access points or 5/2.4GHz network decisions. Access control is great and partly justifies the high price. In future, I hope to see internet content filtering and an outdoor access point.

Title: Loved it!!
Review Comment: Loved it!! Loved it!!

Title: Great system, great software!
Review Comment: Great system, great software! It just works as advertised. Too often systems promise and don't deliver, this wifi system hands down is the best I've ever had (and I've beer through quite a few).  Their app is just as good as their hardware.

Title: Amazing system
Review Comment: Amazing system I love the coverage in my plaster-on-metal-lathe-clad,  2,400 sq. ft. home. I also love the ability to customize the DNS settings; I am using OpenDNS to make my network kid-friendly. It would be great if eero had its own family filter, but the custom DNS thing works well enough for now.

Title: Simply put,......it works!!!!!!!
Review Comment: Simply put,......it works!!!!!!! I had problems with wifi coverage. Extenders were not the answer.  Plugged in the eero and problem solved!

Title: Love the mesh
Review Comment: Love the mesh The best purchase I have made. Love the coverage

Title: This is the real deal
Review Comment: This is the real deal Totally awesome system. I had dead zones in numerous places and wifi was hit or miss. By using 3 units my wifi issues have disappeared. Easiest thing to set up, maybe 10 min of which 9 were placement issues. A must buy.

Title: Great product
Review Comment: Great product WiFi works awesome with this product.  My house had dead zones with a wireless N router.  I have 3 eeros placed around my house and never have wifi issues and can move around the house without disconnections. The app works great.  Rarely use it but go in to see what the wifi speed is.  It's nice to also see the dhcp lease info.  I can see what IP a device on my network has in a few seconds.

Title: Just a little more
Review Comment: Just a little more App is nice and intuitive for what it does. Full support for advanced features are not available for Android and eero units themselves don't support pppoe yet. If your ok with talking with tech support, they can help in getting you up and running.  When it's up and working it is great. Will give 5 stars once all kinks are worked out.

Title: Almost Perfect
Review Comment: Almost Perfect Well constructed spp.  Successfully set up and then it told me it wasn't.  A reboot and then was good. Subsequently devices installed perfectly.  Strong wifi now. Overall a bit light on extra features.  For $500 for 3 devices check out its competitors.

Title: Drishti and Tirtha
Review Comment: Drishti and Tirtha None

Title: Works great with my 30 devices
Review Comment: Works great with my 30 devices I needed something business grade with family profiles and this was fit for purpose. Half my devices are hard wired the rest are wireless.

Title: Clean and simple
Review Comment: Clean and simple The Eero application is great.  It gives you information at a glance about your network, its performance, and each Eero itself.  Adding groups for devices is intuitive, and configuring any advanced networking changes is straightforward.  It would have been easy to make a bad application given how great the actual system functions, but Eero chose to put just as much effort into both in order to provide users with a great experience all around.

Title: Simple
Review Comment: Simple Very easy and intuitive. Setup was quick and easy. Advanced security would be nice. Great product!

Title: Best!
Review Comment: Best! Finally found something that works!!

Title: EERO
Review Comment: EERO Love it!

Title: Best Wi-Fi I ever used
Review Comment: Best Wi-Fi I ever used The security setting may need improvement
Not in.india
Holy crap
Only US and Canada
Works great after new update! Thanks!

Title: Big update with Family Profiles and named Connected Devices
Review Comment: Big update with Family Profiles and named Connected Devices Nice to see eero continuing to invest in user experience despite their huge success out of the gate.
Your web page states "Android 4.4 and up", but the application does not support tablets. I wish I tried to install the application before I purchased your product.

Title: Crashing after setup
Review Comment: Crashing after setup Using two different phones, after setting up the eero network app now crashes after login. Uninstalled and reinstalled and still happens. Hoping the app runs on the phone for the client for whom we bought this.
This is awesome. Routers work great.

Title: Finally, A System That Works
Review Comment: Finally, A System That Works I had a question about integration with my Verizon FiOS WiFi, and a very helpful customer service person easily talked me through the process. She even managed the bridging remotely. Highly recommended.

Title: Great device
Review Comment: Great device The actually deliver on their promise, a rare trait for start-up. Frequent updates have added some much needed features. And the customer support has been the best I've ever encountered.

Title: Switch to this system!
Review Comment: Switch to this system! Great product. Great app. Great customer support. Love this! My home network is fast and so much more reliable than with the old equipment my service provider gave me. Works all over the house!

Title: Excellent product!!!!
Review Comment: Excellent product!!!! Works as advertised. I love it and hope they develop other products. ðŸ˜†

Title: Trouble free
Review Comment: Trouble free Once I figured out I could plug in a wired switch . . . .

Title: Lives up to the hype
Review Comment: Lives up to the hype Just got it and my son is ecstatic. Finally has good wifi in his room. Even the wifi in my office which contains the base station is faster. Bought the 3 pack  and his ps4 has noticeably less lag. App worked perfectly as advertised.
Yup it works

Title: WTF
Review Comment: WTF My mobile number is not working their

Very nice! Easy setup. Including using my own LAN IP address range and configuring static IPs and port forwards. More configurable than an OnHub. Great wifi coverage, I'm using a 3 pack. :)  The main sadly missing feature: Local DNS for my LAN. My hosts need local names! But eero delegates to public DNS servers instead of running a local forwarder such as dnsmasq like other routers. :/

Title: Love my eero
Review Comment: Love my eero So easy to setup and I love the emails telling me about updates to the system

Title: Some issues early but great now
Review Comment: Some issues early but great now After some early hiccups, everything is working great now
Works great.

Title: Finally, everything works in this latest version
Review Comment: Finally, everything works in this latest version I knew it was the app, my device list wouldn't show in prior versions, all works in the app now. They still need to improve eero to poi t to better speedtest servers, numbers are totally inaccurate. Otherwise, eero is great.

It works great. My farthest room from my router always had poor wifi reception but now its much better.  I tried to set up in one room but it would not allow it.  I have 3, but I feel 4 would be ideal, like 4 corners in a house. So ez to setup though if it allows it. Simple, upfront.  Pretty much met my expectations...

Title: Working
Review Comment: Working Works well so far. No dead areas in house and covers the outside area really strong as well.

Update 3/8/2016: The Eero crew has come through, and delivered the app updates for "Advanced" settings as well as the list of devices attached to the network. 5 stars like I promised! :-)   // My Original Review: Great start! I wrestled with my Comcast router over bridge mode for several hours, and failed, but got my network setup in a double NAT capacity. This isn't eero's fault, but they'll get 5 stars once the Advanced options come to the app and I can put my eero's into bridge mode. Also, I've noticed that the dashboard only lists the number of devices connected, but I can't tap that zone to see a list of them. :(  @eero: Will that be coming in the next Android update?

Hardware setup is super easy, what the app does works great and base network runs flawlessly, it's just missing a bunch of basic functions for managing your network routers.  Will bump to 5 stars once the app gets updated.  ** Updated to 5 stars following the app update.  great job to the team at Eero! I couldn't be happier with my Eero setup.

Title: Android version isn't finished yet.
Review Comment: Android version isn't finished yet. Apple version is much more complete than this one.  This version works and the eeros work great in my house.  They just need to finish this 1.0 one. Got the update.  Everything works great.

Title: Outstanding!
Review Comment: Outstanding! No more manual resets. I've had my eero system up for ten days. Lost signal only once, and it reconnected itself automatically within a few minutes. Such an improvement over my old WiFi which had to be manually reset several times a day.

Great starting point for initial setup of the eero system. Advanced Settings is now available and allows more control over tuning the system to my network needs. It's also nice to be able to view the specifics of devices connected to my network. It would be nice to be able to assign "friendly" names to these devices for easier tracking.

Title: Getting there!
Review Comment: Getting there! Finally bridge mode! I can setup my eero's as access points as I had planned on. Looking forward to continued development. Hopefully we'll see some better communication from the company regarding updates (firmware) and plans (road map).

Title: Excellent app
Review Comment: Excellent app Now that they have updated the app to allow advanced settings, it is perfect. I can finally put my Eeros in Bridge Mode!

Title: Works great
Review Comment: Works great Setup was a snap. Great house coverage. Sharing a guest password is clever. Nice details. Even the packaging is remarkable.

As an early user (beta tester) of the product, I find my experience with eero itself to be awesome: the system of 3 eeros covered my whole apartment with fast WiFi. There's literally no place in my apartment where you can't get blazing speeds on the Internet. I don't see the buffering wheel anymore when watching Netflix/Hulu.  The app itself is super simple and makes it easy to setup and manage your eero network. It is a bit bare-bones at the moment, and has some features missing, but I didn't personally need them and my experience has been great.

Title: Dead zones no more
Review Comment: Dead zones no more Product delivers and app makes getting things up and running easy

Title: Awesome as an early adopter!
Review Comment: Awesome as an early adopter! I've been an early adopter for a few home smart devices. This is the first time where I have no issues using the app at launch. There's a few options missing, but everything seems to work. Finally, a product which feels polished at launch. Eero rocks!

Title: Just works
Review Comment: Just works Received 3 eero's yesterday. Setup and configured. Better wifi throughout the house. Especially like automatic firmware updates.

Pretty amazing so far.  Setup of a new router / wifi system usually takes some time, and then you have to get ahold of everyone in the household and update their devices.  Not so with this app and the eero devices.  Setup took 10 minutes to have all three eero boxes in place and working with this app.    Notifying everyone in the house of the change is done in the app with text or email notifications.  I didn't even have to speak to anyone other than to tell them ahead of time that a new network would be coming up.  Connectivity is spectacular.    I had several dead spots in my house before eero.  This was mostly due to the wifi router plus extender system that most people use.  Every corner of my house now has excellent wifi signal strength and you never have to switch from one device to another.    As far as speed is concerned, I had 4 FireTV sticks playing HD video, 6 phones browsing, and 3 computers playing Youtube videos last night, and there was no buffering or waiting.  Excellent!

Title: Only for basic networks with few wired devices
Review Comment: Only for basic networks with few wired devices Lacks advanced features since they are targeting basic, WiFi only style of usage. WiFi itself just does not work well with some devices like VPN. Therefore, they need access to advanced settings and need an option for a head router that has 4+ ports. Sorry Google / Eero, we're not all idiots

Title: Great router
Review Comment: Great router Amazing performance with this product.  Wish I could apply limits to devices connected and also disconnect devices on the network

Title: Super easy setup
Review Comment: Super easy setup Instrumental in setting up the system and worked perfectly. The design is on point and professional.

Title: Couldn't be easier...
Review Comment: Couldn't be easier... Easy to setup,  great performance and range.   Waiting for the advanced features.

Title: So easy
Review Comment: So easy Just recieved my eero today. Set up all 3 in like 5 minutes, works great so far
Disclaimer: I help build this app (ohai Lotan from Reddit)! This has been a huge improvement in my home WiFi! Also a really nicely designed app.

Title: Wi-Fi from the window to the wall!
Review Comment: Wi-Fi from the window to the wall! Super easy setup, and fixed a "dead" spot in my apartment. Thanks eero!

Title: Super simple
Review Comment: Super simple Simple setup that works.  Can't wait for new advanced features.

Title: Easiest setup ever!
Review Comment: Easiest setup ever! The days of browsing to 192.168.1.1 and using a webapp from the 90s to configure your network are over.  Now anyone can setup their own network.
Amazing!
